message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $14500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand your perspective, Alice. However, based on my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $13500 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $14500. How about we meet in the middle at $14250? I think it's a fair compromise considering the value you place on the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my calculations and understanding of the market, I would like to propose a price of $13750 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $14000? I think it's a fair price considering the value you place on the product.
